text.section: A member may purchase service credit as provided in this section for periods of employment described in subsection (c) of this section for which the member is not otherwise entitled to service credit.

section.section:
A member who purchases service credit under this section shall:
complete a claim for the service credit and file it with the Board of Trustees on the form that the Board of Trustees provides; and
pay to the Board of Trustees an amount equal to the annuity reserve and pension reserve required to fund the additional allowance.
The member shall pay for service credit purchased under this section in a single payment at retirement.
